amendment.description: Amendment adds to the bill the text of the "East Asia Security Act of 2005" which seeks to deter arms transfers by foreign countries to the People's Republic of China.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 109-175 to authorize measures to deter arms transfers by foreign countries to the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Hyde.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
